|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== [[Qualcomm Atheros]] Rome Reference Design with on-board external FEM :for enhanced, filtered performance at 5GHz (QCA, P/N QCNFA364AH) *[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6174A-5 chipset (part for the ''Rome'' family) :2T2R PCIe in NGFF / M.2 interface Wi-Fi Adapter Card :Dual Band 802.11abgn/ac & BT 5.0 Combo Module (up to 867Mbps) :Wave2 MU-MIMO Compliant Socketed Solution :Backwards compatible to mPCIe full size slot via the VOXMICRO :AIRETOS click-on adapter (MPN# AXS-1NGFF2E)
According to the [https://fccid.io/2AE3B-AFX-QCA6174 filling documents] on the FCC, the following models :are based on identical code design: * AFX-QCA6174 * AFX-QCA6174-NC * AFX-QCA6174-NX
[[Category:English Documentation]]
